data.title: Best Private School Little Rock
data.meta_description: Episcopal Collegiate offers students Pre-K through 12th an outstanding education and learning environment — making it the best private school in Little Rock
data.text:
Head of School, Dr. Jamie Griffin, discusses private school trends alongside other thought-leaders in the education industry, in a feature titled "A Class of One's Own: Numerous Factors Make Private Schools More Attractive to Some Parents," by Mak Millard and Sarah DeClerk. ⁠

Mrs. Catherine Radtke, Director of Student Support Services and Associate Head of Lower School was recently published in the latest Stroll the Heights edition talking about Episcopal Collegiate’s Wellness Program.
